name.baseName: All pesticide species ; Formulation materials ; Simple mixing or splitting ; All sizes; NESPS2
所有农药品种 ; 制剂原料 ; 单纯混合或者分装 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution All Types of Pesticidesis(Absorption + diversion) + (adsorption + steam desorption)/(adsorption + nitrogen/air desorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution All Types of Pesticidesis(Absorption + diversion) + (adsorption + steam desorption)/(adsorption + nitrogen/air desorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了各种规模的农药品种制剂原料的简单混合或分装应用。适用于农药行业，可以用于大规模生产和小规模操作。此外，它还详述了用于控制挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）排放的尾气处理技术。这些技术包括吸收与分流组合系统和吸附与蒸汽脱附系统，以及使用吸附和氮气或空气脱附系统。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,三级代码263.0文件，在完整版文件中第2936页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundis(Absorption + diversion) + (adsorption + steam desorption)/(adsorption + nitrogen/air desorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是（吸收+分流）+（吸附+蒸汽解析）/（吸附+氮气/空气解析），其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundis(Adsorption + steam desorption)/(adsorption + nitrogen/air desorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是（吸附+蒸汽解析）/（吸附+氮气/空气解析），其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物
源文件中描述为为所有农药品种，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物
